mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_company(id, username, password, company_name, company_address, company_email, landine_phone, contact, phone, credit_id, company_type, representative, establishment_time, start_time, end_time, business_scope, registration_authority, registration_time, files, state, submit_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{companyName}, #{companyAddress}, #{companyEmail}, #{landinePhone}, #{contact}, #{phone}, #{creditId}, #{companyType}, #{representative}, #{establishmentTime},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{businessScope},#{registrationAuthority},#{registrationTime}, #{files},#{state},#{submitTime})
